definition: to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部绞痛，呕吐和腹泻，通常是血便。

sentences.english: She returns not to untie her but just to add black tape to her gag and to put her into a hogtie.
sentences.chinese: 她返回不要解开她只是添加黑胶带呕吐，把她捆绑。

sentences.english: Do vomiting and the eyesight that can diarrhoea cause abrupt sex drop?
sentences.chinese: 呕吐和腹泻会引起突然性的视力下降吗？

sentences.english: Do whatever you want, but just don't be seen passing out or puking out of a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 做你想做的，但不要让人看见你昏倒或呕吐。

sentences.english: Do not use when abdominal pain, nausea or vomiting are present.
sentences.chinese: 当腹部感到疼痛时，恶心，呕吐时请勿使用。

sentences.english: Why I often upset stomach, still vomit.
sentences.chinese: 为什么我经常肚子痛，还呕吐。

sentences.english: Opioid premedication may contribute to the incidence of postoperative nausea and vomiting.
sentences.chinese: 预给阿片类药物可以减轻术后发生的恶心呕吐。

sentences.english: I would never barf in your urn, Brenda.
sentences.chinese: 我从不会在你的缸子里呕吐。

sentences.english: Alcoholics get special treatment making them throw up every time they drink alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒者得到特殊的治疗让他们每次在喝酒后呕吐。

sentences.english: Bilious vomiting was the characteristic clinical situation in neonatal period.
sentences.chinese: 新生儿期以胆汁性呕吐为特点。

sentences.english: In acute bowel obstruction, patients have colicky abdominal pain with vomiting.
sentences.chinese: 急性肠梗阻的病人出现腹部绞痛和呕吐。

sentences.english: Why should anesthesiologists be concerned about nausea and vomiting?
sentences.chinese: 为什么麻醉科医生必须关注恶心与呕吐？

sentences.english: The patient developed nausea and vomited bile-stained fluid on several occasio.
sentences.chinese: 这病人恶心，曾呕吐了含有胆汁液体数次。

sentences.english: Less-common side effects include fever, vomiting, and diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 较少见的副作用包括发烧，呕吐，腹泻。

sentences.english: He has chucked up his breakfast again .
sentences.chinese: 他把吃的早饭又呕吐出来了。

sentences.english: May I have an air-sick bag?

definition: variant of 惡心|恶心[e3 xin1]
